entry.title: knfs-library/bbq: A lightweight and efficient job queuing system designed to integrate directly on local files of Node.js applications. With built-in support for job management, workers, and message handling, BBQ helps you streamline asynchronous task execution and improve the performance of your applications.
entry.content: A lightweight and efficient job queuing system designed to integrate directly on local files of Node.js applications. With built-in support for job management, workers, and message handling, BBQ helps you streamline asynchronous task execution and improve the performance of your applications.
